summary: Voice notes app with three blue rectangular buttons for recording, viewing, and deleting notes
architectural_notes: Three distinct blue rectangular buttons at bottom of screen
Each button: blue background, icon + black/gray text

existing_features.title: Transform the three action controls at the bottom of the screen into prominent rectangular buttons with solid blue backgrounds. Each button must be a distinct blue rectangle containing both an icon and text label.
The first button must display a microphone icon with the text 'Enregistrer mes notes' in black or gray color on the blue background.
The second button must display a paper/document icon with the text 'Voir mes notes' in black or gray color on the blue background.
The third button must display a trash/bin icon with the text 'Effacer mes notes' in black or gray color on the blue background.

new_feature_requests.summary: Three blue rectangular buttons with icons and text for recording, viewing, and deleting notes
